name: Anointed
description: '''Anointed''' is a [[contemporary Christian music|Christian pop]] and [[Christian R&B|R&B]] duo from [[Columbus, Ohio]], known for their strong vocals and harmonies, featuring siblings Steve Crawford and Da'dra Crawford Greathouse, along with former members Nee-C Walls (who left the group in 2001) and Mary Tiller (who left in 1995). Their musical style includes elements of [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]], [[Pop music|pop]], [[Rock music|rock]], [[funk]] and piano [[ballad]]s. The group has won seven [[GMA Dove Awards|Dove Awards]], two [[Stellar Awards]] and three [[Grammy Award]] nominations. The group has also been featured on several Christian compilation albums such as ''Real Life Music'', [[1996 in music|1996]] and [[WOW The 90s]].
